{"step_by_step_thinking": "Endometriotic lesions are abnormal growths of endometrial tissue outside the uterus. Histology refers to the microscopic examination of the tissue. Low insulin: Insulin is a hormone involved in regulating blood sugar levels. It is not directly related to the histology of endometriotic lesions. C.
